Prev: Julia Pops Up Up: Riptide vs. Blue Flames Next: Safe At First

Out For Not Sliding



Kind of blurry, but I kept this because it was one of the key plays of the game. With the bases loaded and one of our better hitters, Shannon, up, Mattie tried to steal home, and reached the plate before being tagged, but was called out for not sliding.
Taken Tuesday, April 11, 2006, 05:31:31PM. Original image size: 2048x2560, 1.4Mb
Technical details: Canon EOS D60, 1/500s @ F4.0, ISO 200, 70-200mm/F2.8+1.4x @ 160mm (256mm equiv)
PS7 CRW 4700:5, 1:3:50:50:0:25:35, Crop, USM 20:5
